statements: SELECT * FROM waste_management_events
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM waste_management_events
SELECT event_location, event_name, event_date FROM waste_management_events WHERE event_type = 'Waste Collection'
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM waste_management_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_location, event_type FROM waste_management_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM waste_management_events WHERE event_type = 'Waste Collection' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM waste_management_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_type FROM waste_management_events WHERE event_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_location FROM waste_management_events ORDER BY event_location;
SELECT COUNT(event_id), event_type FROM waste_management_events GROUP BY event_type HAVING COUNT(event_id) > 1 ORDER BY event_type DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_location = 'City Park';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM community_clean_up WHERE clean_up_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_location = 'Park'
SELECT clean_up_name, clean_up_date, clean_up_location FROM community_clean_up ORDER BY clean_up_date DESC
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Recycling%' OR event_location LIKE '%Town%'
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location FROM waste_collection_events ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_time FROM waste_collection_events;
SELECT event_location, event_description FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM clean_up_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE initiative_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_id, event_location, event_description FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01' AND event_location LIKE '%Park%'
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_date, initiative_location, initiative_description FROM clean_up_initiatives WHERE DATE(initiative_date) = CURDATE()
SELECT event_id, event_location, event_description, participant_name FROM waste_collection_events JOIN participants ON waste_collection_events.event_id = participants.initiative_id
SELECT event_id, event_location, event_description FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_location = 'Beach' OR event_description LIKE '%volunteers%'
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM WasteCollectionEvents WHERE event_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM CommunityCleanUpInitiatives ORDER BY initiative_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM Participants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT organizer_name, organization_name, contact_email FROM Organizers WHERE organization_name = 'Green Earth';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_type, organizer_id FROM WasteCollectionEvents WHERE event_type = 'Cleanup' ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_date, coordinator_id FROM CommunityCleanUpInitiatives WHERE initiative_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY initiative_date ASC;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM Participants ORDER BY participant_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, organization_name, contact_email FROM Organizers WHERE organizer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM waste_collection_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_description FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_location = 'Park';
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_date FROM cleanup_initiatives WHERE lead_organization = 'Green Earth';
SELECT site_name, site_address FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE site_capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_location='Park';
SELECT initiative_name, lead_organization FROM cleanup_initiatives WHERE initiative_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%cleanup%';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email, volunteer_phone FROM cleanup_volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
